name: Monster Mini Golf
description: Embark on an epic mini golf adventure of 36 holes through fantastical forests and creepy graveyards. Choose your mythical spooky monster and putt wisely, least you go out of bounds and have to restart the level. Choose a ball, be it one you feel is lucky or simply for the aesthetic and putt the day away to frightful tunes as you explore these otherwordly courses. Don't get tricked by the traps or you'll miss the sweet, sweet treat of a hole-in-one.
